name: Feelings arise before Intellect ( les sens interviennent avant l’intelligence )
description:
This is the first part of a new collection based on the filmography of French director Robert Bresson and an interview he gave to television where Bresson said "les sens interviennent avant l’intelligence ".

The image was made from the extraction of frames from his films and interviews and the subsequent processing through artificial intelligence software and neural network training. 

An experimental generative film, a tribute and free transposition to Bresson's cinema, putting emotion before intellect. Premises in the methods and conception of cinema according to the French director.
